name: creepily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is strange or unnatural and makes you feel frightened: Yet it is all creepily real, and every word seems true. The eyes on the painting make her almost creepily lifelike.
in a way that is unpleasant and makes you feel uncomfortable, especially because of sexual behaviour that is unwanted or inappropriate (= not suitable for the situation): He laughed creepily to himself. The bank manager became creepily nice when the local paper reported the man's win.
More examplesFewer examplesHe stared at her creepily until she turned round to see if she recognized him.The leading character is creepily believable. The scene ends with her looking creepily over her boyfriend's shoulder into the camera.
